data.message: Hi facebook people I am unable to access my sale groups is it an update or anything else hope to get a reply from you guys. Really need to access those pages and groups, a reply would be nice

replies.message: Hey Edward. We've deprecated the ability to login and use Facebook as the Page you manage. However, we've built parallel features to enable you to do all of the same things you could previously do, without requiring you to use Facebook as your Page. Let us know if you have any questions. -Jordan
Thanks for replying actually i don't manage the pages the problem is that i am unable to access them i am unable to enter those groups and pages
Any way I can access this groups I need to check on some items that are on sale any help would be appreciated
